text: Ab tak Ethopiyā apne āp ko mahfūz samajhtā hai, lekin us din merī taraf se qāsid nikal kar us mulk ke bāshindoṅ ko aisī ḳhabar pahuṅchāeṅge jis se wuh thartharā uṭheṅge. Kyoṅki qāsid kashtiyoṅ meṅ baiṭh kar Dariyā-e-Nīl ke zariye un tak pahuṅcheṅge aur unheṅ ittalā deṅge ki Misr tabāh ho gayā hai. Yih sun kar wahāṅ ke log kāṅp uṭheṅge. Yaqīn karo, yih din jald hī āne wālā hai.
